thread.title: John Elway Gives Neil Gorsuch a Glowing Public Endorsement
thread.title_full: John Elway Gives Neil Gorsuch a Glowing Public Endorsement

author: Kim Smith
title: John Elway Gives Neil Gorsuch a Glowing Public Endorsement
text:
Little Kids Suffer Serious Burns After Being Tricked Into Playing “Fire Fairy” Game 
A quarterback who won two Super Bowls during his 16-year playing career with the Broncos, Elway is well known as a winner on the football field, but his political positions are a little more ambiguous. 
In an interview with KUSA earlier this year, he said he’s interested in politics and supports the Republican Party but that he would never run for political office, even though the topic comes up from time to time. 
And while the Denver news station KDVR reported that fans spotted the former quarterback at President Donald Trump’s inauguration ceremony in January, it also reported that there was no record of Elway ever endorsing Trump for president. 
Still, the Hall of Famer certainly gave Gorsuch a glowing endorsement, and that’s definitely good news. 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter to spread the words about John Elway’s letter of support for Neil Gorsuch. What do you think of Elway's endorsement? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
